docs.doc: Footer should contain secondary navigation links and copyright, with minimal styling to not distract from main content.
Layout components should be placed in src/components/layout/. Footer.tsx is specified alongside header.tsx.
All UI text in Norwegian (Bokmål), code in English. Components use PascalCase, files use kebab-case. Mobile-first CSS with Tailwind.
Header already implemented - provides pattern for layout component structure and sticky positioning.

file.reason: Must integrate Footer component here after main content area
file.notes: Layout uses min-h-screen flex flex-col pattern. Main has flex-1. Footer should be added after main, before closing body.

file.reason: Reference for component structure and styling patterns
file.notes: Uses 'use client', lucide-react icons, Next.js Link, Tailwind classes. Follow same patterns for Footer.

file.reason: Mobile bottom nav exists - footer should coordinate with this
file.notes: On mobile, bottom nav shows. Footer may need extra padding (pb-16) to not overlap.

npm.package: App Router, Link component for navigation

constraints.constraint: All UI text must be in Norwegian (Bokmål). Code comments and variable names in English.
Follow existing component patterns from header.tsx - consistent structure, prop interfaces, Tailwind classes.
Use muted colors (text-muted-foreground, bg-muted/30). Border-top to separate from content.
Mobile-first design. Links should flex-wrap or stack on small screens.
Footer must work with sticky footer pattern - stays at bottom on short pages.
Links must have hover and focus states, keyboard navigable, proper contrast.
